definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Yet, most Tibetan men in northeastern India join the SFF.
sentences.chinese: 然而，印东北大部分藏族男子都加入这一特种部队。

sentences.english: "Kharrazi said, " U. S. special forces killed in Pakistan this.
sentences.chinese: 拉齐还说，“美国特种部队在巴基斯坦杀害了本。

sentences.english: Even the Green Berets themselves didn't like that film. The movie was just way too saccharin.
sentences.chinese: 甚至绿色贝雷帽特种部队本身也不喜欢那部电影。

sentences.english: As the operation unraveled, the U. S. team called for help.
sentences.chinese: 战斗打响后，美军的这支特种部队要求增援。

sentences.english: Only one other job in the Army, Special Forces, rates such a super-sized retention bonus.
sentences.chinese: 部队中只有特种部队享有如此高额奖金。

sentences.english: Bodyguards are usually recruited from the ranks of former soldiers and retired members of special forces.
sentences.chinese: 保镖通常是从招募前特种部队士兵和退休人员的行列。

sentences.english: How familiar were you with G. I. JOE and the character of Snake Eyes?
sentences.chinese: 你对《特种部队》以及蛇眼这个角色有多熟悉？

sentences.english: Special operations forces have added tens of thousands to their ranks.
sentences.chinese: 数以万计的特种部队被派往前线。

sentences.english: AH/MH-6J - Improved special forces transport and attack versions.
sentences.chinese: 改进的特种部队运输和攻击的版本。

sentences.english: The teams are likely to include Green Berets, U. S. Army commandos who specialize in advising foreign troops.
sentences.chinese: 特种部队包括绿色贝雷部队，专用于辅助海外派兵。

sentences.english: We will double our special forces to conduct anti-terrorist operations.
sentences.chinese: 我们将加倍特种部队的力量来进行反恐行动。

sentences.english: There was a commandant, plus special troops, and other female guards.
sentences.chinese: 有一个总指挥，还有特种部队以及其它女看守。

sentences.english: The rangers joined other special troops to try to free Israelis taken hostage by several gunmen.
sentences.chinese: 特别突击队员和其他特种部队成员试图解救这些人质。

sentences.english: 7Saudi special forces take part in a military parade, preparing for the Hajj in Mecca on November 10, 2010. (MUSTAFA OZER/AFP/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 沙特特种部队参加阅兵式，为麦加朝圣做准备。

sentences.english: G. I. Joe: Rise of Cobra.
sentences.chinese: 特种部队之眼镜蛇的崛起。

sentences.english: Has anybody seen my G. I. Joe?
sentences.chinese: 有人看到我的特种部队了吗？

definition: secret service/special service/secret service agent/special agent
